environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability through a $545 million sustainable credit facility tied to ESG KPIs
social_issues: Resistance to digital platform adoption by traditional stakeholders
Need for significant investment in education and user-friendly solutions
governance_issues: Strong corporate governance and risk management practices
Active oversight by Board of Directors and committees
